Name: Simson Tuningwerkstatt 3D
About the game: This Game allows you to virtually tune the favorite GDR motobike brand Simson. Start from scratch or pick a predefined style. Replace individual parts and apply different colors to try out new ideas. There are 500+ parts included and several color palettes (RAL, Leifalit, Effect-Colors, Custom-Materials). You can save and share your work at any time.
